text:
Mark Peterson Mark Peterson Weather Anchor
Author facebook Author twitter Author email Jan 3, 2025 Jan 3, 2025 Updated 6 mins ago Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Winter Weather Advisory today due to Freezing Rain potential. Rain and Mountain snow high of 36. Saturday and SUnday will see evening rain/snow and 38. Dry, cloudy and cooler next week with highs in the mid 30s.
